Selena Gomez Kegirangan Rajai Tangga Musik AS
06 Nov 2019, 01:08 by Tim, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Selena Gomez mengungkapkan dirinya telah bekerja sangat keras untuk dua single terbarunya. (AFP PHOTO / ALBERTO PIZZOLI)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Selena Gomez baru saja meraih puncak kesuksesan lewat lagu 'Lose You to Love Me'. Untuk pertama kali sepanjang kariernya, Gomez berhasil menandai posisi nomor 1 di tangga musik Billboard Hot 100.Dalam waktu bersamaan, penyanyi berusia 27 tahun ini menduduki puncak tangga musik Rolling Stone 100. Kegembiraan atas capaian itu ia tuangkan dalam sejumlah unggahan di media sosial."WHAT?! Omg!! Terima kasih banyak @billboardcharts memberikan yang pertama untukku. Saya sangat bersyukur," tulisnya di Story di Instagram."Terima kasih, kalian telah streaming dan berkomitmen untuk lagu ini. Ini sangat berarti untuk saya. Lagu ini memiliki sepenuh hati saya," tambah Gomez lewat unggahan lain.Sementara di Twitter, Gomez menuliskan pesan lebih panjang untuk menyampaikan rasa syukur."Nomor 1 pertama saya. Lagu ini sangat saya sayangi. Saya telah bekerja sangat keras untuk membuat album ini sejujur dan semenyenangkan mungkin. Namun tetap cukup rentan untuk berbagi tentang kehidupan saya saat ini. Saya sangat mencintai kalian dan terima kasih banyak untuk mendengarkan," tulis pelantun Back To You itu.



Lose You to Love Me merupakan lagu yang dirilis pada 23 Oktober lalu. Lagu ini menjadi tindak pertama Gomez setelah beberapa waktu vakum dari dunia musik untuk fokus pada pemulihan kesehatan mental.Lagu ini sekaligus sebagai curahan hati Gomez yang diduga terinspirasi dari kisah cinta dengan sang mantan kekasih, Justin Bieber. Hanya selang satu hari dari perilisan Lose You to Love Me, ia melepas lagu bertajuk 'Look At Her Now' dengan nuansa yang cukup kontras.Jika mendengarkan Lose You To Love Me, lirik lagu itu seolah menggambarkan kondisi usai pulih dari hubungan yang buruk dan belajar untuk mencintai diri sendiri, sementara lewat Look At Her Now, Gomez menunjukkan telah siap melanjutkan hidup dan menemukan cinta dengan lebih percaya diri. (rea/rea)

Selena Gomez Excited Rajai US Music Charts
Nov 6 2019, 01:08 by Team, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Selena Gomez revealed that she has worked very hard for her two new singles. (AFP PHOTO / ALBERTO PIZZOLI)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Selena Gomez has just reached the pinnacle of success through the song 'Lose You to Love Me'. For the first time in his career, Gomez managed to mark the number 1 position on the Billboard Hot 100 music chart. At the same time, the 27-year-old singer topped the Rolling Stone 100 music charts. The excitement over that achievement he poured in a number of uploads on social media. " WHAT ?! Omg !! Thank you very much @billboardcharts for giving me the first. I am very grateful, "he wrote on Story on Instagram." Thank you, you guys have been streaming and committed to this song. This means a lot to me. This song has all my heart, "Gomez added through another upload. While on Twitter, Gomez wrote a longer message to convey gratitude." My first number 1. This song is very dear to me. I have worked very hard to make this album as honest and pleasant as possible. "But still quite vulnerable to share about my life at this time. I really love you guys and thank you very much for listening," wrote pe the back to you song.



Lose You to Love Me is a song released on October 23rd. This song became Gomez's first act after some time of vacuum from the music world to focus on the recovery of mental health. This song was at the same time as an outpouring of Gomez's heart that was allegedly inspired by a love story with his ex-lover, Justin Bieber. Only one day after the release of Lose You to Love Me, he released the song titled 'Look At Her Now' with quite contrasting nuances. If listening to Lose You to Love Me, the song's lyrics seemed to describe the condition after recovering from a bad relationship and learning to love yourself, while through Look At Her Now, Gomez shows that he is ready to move on and find love with more confidence.
